channel.title: Comments on: Donâ€™t Let Overwhelming Distress Take You Down.
channel.description: Strategies to recover from stress quickly

item.title: By: Peter
item.dc:creator: Peter
item.description: I like you started with breathing first. Essential. Then you can move into more involved ways to deal with signs of stress. Important that you mention using imagination. Oftentimes we are so overcome with stress that we don't think straight. Being imaginative can be very helpful.
item.content:encoded: I like you started with breathing first. Essential. Then you can move into more involved ways to deal with signs of stress. Important that you mention using imagination. Oftentimes we are so overcome with stress that we don’t think straight. Being imaginative can be very helpful.
